protein.specific_function: May be involved in the calcium-dependent regulation of rhodopsin phosphorylation. Binds three calcium ions

reference.reference_text: Wang W, Zhou Z, Zhao W, Huang Y, Tang R, Ying K, Xie Y, Mao Y: Molecular cloning, mapping and characterization of the human neurocalcin delta gene (NCALD). Biochim Biophys Acta. 2001 Mar 19;1518(1-2):162-7.
